LanguageData.ARA_SymbioticStabilizer.label: Pheromone suppression
LanguageData.ARA_SymbioticStabilizer.description: The effect of Arachne's pheromone solvent is active. It mimics the symbiotic signals of insect communities and suppresses the activity of internal parasites. While the solvent is effective, the progress of pseudonematode parasitism does not exceed 80%.
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneAddiction.label: Pheromone dependence
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneAddiction.description: A chemical dependence has been formed on Arachne's pheromone solvent, which must be used regularly to maintain the pseudonematode ecological balance in the body, or severe withdrawal symptoms will occur.
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneAddiction.stages.1.label: Withdrawal symptoms
